meanings.sent1: Her educatedness was evident in the way she spoke.
meanings.sent2: His educatedness on the subject impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of educatedness in cooking, he attempted to make a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: Her educatedness shone like a beacon in the sea of ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The educatedness of the professor made the lecture engaging and informative.

meanings.definition: The state of having knowledge or training.
meanings.sent1: The educatedness of the team members contributed to their success.
meanings.sent2: His educatedness in computer programming landed him a job at the tech company.
meanings.sent3: The cat's educatedness in catching mice was unmatched in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her educatedness in negotiation tactics helped her secure a good deal.
meanings.sent5: The educatedness of the firefighters saved many lives during the blaze.
